dict.string: GardenBridge needs calendar access to let AI assistants read and create calendar events on your behalf.
GardenBridge needs contacts access to let AI assistants find contact information and birthdays.
GardenBridge needs reminders access to let AI assistants read and create reminders on your behalf.
GardenBridge needs location access to provide your current location to AI assistants when requested.
GardenBridge needs location access to provide your current location to AI assistants when requested.
GardenBridge needs Apple Events access to execute AppleScript automations requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs camera access to capture photos when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs microphone access for audio capture when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs screen capture access to take screenshots when requested by AI assistants.
